thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by albert a.

author: albert a.
title: albert a.
text: Danielle was excellent representative. Courteous, polite, respectful and made me feel at ease. Explained everything and communicated between pauses, excellent. During theses times we who have low self esteem are spoken down too, appreciate someone who speaks to us kindly. Thank you Danielle
